item.title: Books
item.description: Stamped from the Beginning: The Definitive History of Racist Ideas in America by Ibram X. Kendi So You Want to Talk About Race by Ijeoma Oluo Me and White Supremacy: Combat Racism, Change the World, and Become a Good Ancestor by Layla F. Saad White Fragility: Why It’s So Hard for White People to Talk About Racism by Robin DiAngelo How to Be an Antiracist by Ibram X.

item.title: Documentaries
item.description: 13th (YouTube 1:40:40 length) Slavery by Another Name (PBS on YouTube 1:24:56 length)

item.title: Helpful Instagram Posts
item.description: Note that these posts are helpful but are often unsourced. Please talk to leaders you trust about the best ways you can implement these suggestions. Integrating Black Lives Matter into your Instagram Content View this post on Instagram #Talitha #Getty #yacht in #fjærland #fjærlandsfjorden #sognefjorden #mundal #norway #landscape #panorama #travel #instagoodmyphoto #justgoshoot #peoplescreatives #visualsoflife #photography #photoshoot #photodaily #photogram #instagood #picoftheday #fjærland #photooftheday #pentax #nrksf #sognavis
